name: TestsForPseudomonasAeruginosaNucleicAcid
title: Tests for Pseudomonas aeruginosa Nucleic Acid
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Pseudomonas aeruginosa Nucleic Acid),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Pseudomonas aeruginosa Nucleic Acid),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
